byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and JASON GRANT

abstract: Two passengers are killed in wrong-way collision when car carrying four men, including three off-duty police officers from Linden, NJ, strikes tractor-trailer on Staten Island's West Shore Expressway; car was traveling north in southbound lane after leaving strip club in early morning hours, and investigators are probing whether alcohol played a role in crash.
lead_paragraph: A car carrying four people, three of whom were off-duty officers in the Linden, N.J., Police Department, collided with a tractor-trailer early Friday morning.

headline.main: Off-Duty Officer Among 2 Killed in a Wrong-Way Crash on Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Officer Is Among 2 Killed in Wrong-Way Collision

snippet: A car carrying four people, three of whom were off-duty officers in the Linden, N.J., Police Department, collided with a tractor-trailer early Friday morning.
